description:
Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

SHEIN is an affordable online shopping platform offering rich items and trendy goods. Discovering pretty items, trying new things and sharing with others,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life and works as your one-stop shopping destination! We take pride in satisfying our customers and bringing them the best shopping experience.

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now!

Save you more
- Register and get £3 includes sale
- Free limited-time delivery and free returns within 30 Days（*conditions apply）
- Daily flash sales on many items 

Wide selections
- Fun, easy shopping with wide selections
- Browse by New Arrivals, Trends, Category, Best Sellers and more

Considerate services
- Get first access to sale alerts and promotional discounts
- Now accepting PayPal and major Credit Cards 
- Style now, pay later! Choose Afterpay to pay in 4 interest-free payments.
- 24/7 Customer Service and Live Chat available

Contact us:
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/SHEINOFFICIAL/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sheinofficial/
Email: dispute@shein.com


The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

Shop on Temu for exclusive offers. 

No matter what you're looking for, Temu has you covered, including fashion, home decor, handmade crafts, beauty & cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and more.

Download Temu today and enjoy incredible deals daily.

WIDE SELECTION
Discover thousands of new products and shops.

CONVENIENCE
Fast and secure checkout.
Free shipping & returns within 90 days.
*Other conditions may apply

Discover the Zara collection with proposals for Women, Men and Kids. Through our application and our online store, you can shop and see all our new collections and fashion editorials for the upcoming seasons. 


Woman: 
Among Zara's proposals for women are the following categories of clothing and accessories: 
-	Shirts 
-	T-shirts/Bodysuits
-	Tops
-	Sweatshirts & Hoodies
-	Skirts
-	Trousers
-	Jeans
-	Shorts
-	Coats
-	Shoes
-	Bags
-	Swimwear
-	Accessories
-	Lingerie
-	Beauty
-	Perfume 
-	Basics
-	Total Look
-	Suits


Man:
The Zara Collection for men includes: 
-	Basics
-	Trousers
-	Cargo/parachute 
-	Jeans

-	Sweatshirts & Hoodies
-	T-shirts

-	Trench coats

-	Bags/backpacks

Kids:
A selection for garments, accessories and shoes for: 
-	Girl: 6–⁠14 years
-	Boy: 6–⁠14 years
-	Baby girl: 9 months - 6 years
-	Baby boy: 9 months - 6 years
-	Newborn: 0-12 months
	
In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

Your top app for online fashion shopping in Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, Egypt, and Qatar.  Download the H&M app and shop all fashion clothing and accessories such as:

- Women's clothes and accessories including dresses, tops, t-shirts shirts & blouses,hoodies, trousers, shorts, skirts, jumpsuits, cardigans, loungewear, nightwear, lingerie, swimwear, shoes,bags, jewelry, and more.
- Men's clothes and accessories including t-shirts, shirts,hoodies, jackets, blazers, suits, trousers, shorts, loungewear, nightwear,swimwear, shoes, caps,socks, and more.
- Kids' clothes and accessories for boys and girls of all ages.
- Beauty and cosmetics products including makeup for face, eyes, lips, as well as make up bags, perfumes, and more.
- H&M Home products including living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom & kids' room decorations & accessories, furniture, glassware, kitchenware, blankets, rugs, bed linen, and more.
-Explore sportswear you can rely on, whatever the move. By H&M Move.Go for new sportswear to step up the game. Feel good. Look awesome.Your perfect sport tights are your trusty and stylish companions, whether you're sweating in the gym or binge streaming on the couch
Activate push notifications for the app to stay updated with the newest clothes collections and our exclusive online offers, promotions, and discounts. Enjoy a smooth and fun online fashion shopping experience with the app's features including the ability to track your orders step by step from buying them online till their delivery and saving the items you want to have to your wish list to purchase later.

Don't miss out on our best clothes collections and online shopping offers and download the H&M app now. When you download the H&M app, we will process your data in accordance with our privacy notice. For more details on this, please visit https://kw.hm.com/en/privacy-policy/

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

app_name: 拼多多 - 多多买菜，百亿补贴
developer: Shanghai Xunmeng Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
拼多多——多实惠，多乐趣

拼多多，社交新电商，更懂消费者的手机购物APP。8亿用户在此拼团，享受更高性价比的生活。和你的家人、朋友、邻居一起拼，品质商品更低价，包邮送到家，分享实惠，分享乐趣。

-多多买菜
1、依托拼多多全新的农产品上行物流体系，一键直达全国超过1000个农产品产区。
2、从田间到餐桌，避免中间环节损耗，百亿补贴加专项补贴，买菜更划算。
3、手机变成菜篮子，精选全国及海外农产区产地优质好货，覆盖各类生活必需品。
4、足不出户为家庭轻松选购次日生鲜，拿起手机选购，带着蔬果回家。

-更懂生活，好货不必贵
1、品类丰富：覆盖全品类品牌商品。小百货9.9包邮，轻松提升日常幸福感，品牌商品更低价，助你完成美好生活梦想。
2、百亿补贴：精选补贴全网热销品牌商品，直接降价，购物不必做算术题。
3、产地好货：源头好货产地直达，从农田到餐桌，从车间到小区，中国制造四十年产业经验为你敞开。
4、正品保障：假一赔十，品牌商品正品险，海关全程监督。

-分享乐趣，购物不孤单
1、发现好物，与好友共同分享，体验发现低价好货的乐趣。
2、和志同道合的好友拼单，或参与万人团，与8亿拼多多用户一起拼。拼团享受更低价，组团购物不孤单。
3、和朋友玩转小游戏。好朋友，就要一起栽种，一起收获。
4、为好友呈现你的真实点评，为真朋友说出真体验。

-产地直播，商家陪你看海
1、看数百万真实商家产地直播。看红薯从地里挖出，看菠萝的海，看一双鞋如何从生产线走到你面前。
2、市县长代言各产业带好货。市长县长精选本地产业带尖货，化身拼多多主播为你在线答疑。

-多多视频，有趣内容刷不停
1、魔法视频、超多滤镜、新奇特效、一键跟拍，出大片如此简单！
2、生活妙招、搞笑视频、美食菜谱、精彩直播，想看的这里都有！
3、高清画质、全屏沉浸、海量视频、智能推荐，多实惠更多乐趣！

因为倾听，所以更懂你

官方微信：拼多多（pinduoduo2015）
官方微博：@拼多多
客服电话：400-8822-528
消费者固话热线：021-53395288
官网：http://www.pinduoduo.com

¡Beauty addict! Descarga la nueva APP oficial de Perfumerías Primor y encuentra las últimas novedades en perfumes, cosmética, maquillaje y mucho más con un solo clic desde cualquier parte. 

Si eres un verdadero amante de la belleza, estás de suerte. En nuestra APP te espera un extenso catálogo con más de 10.000 productos de belleza a los mejores precios del mercado. Desde perfumes exclusivos, cosmética innovadora y maquillaje de la mejor calidad, hasta productos capilares y tratamientos adaptados a cada necesidad. 
Además, podrás disfrutar de las mejores marcas como Armani, Carolina Herrera, Paco Rabanne, Lancôme, Biotherm, L’Oréal y muchas más.


Si buscas productos especializados, no te pierdas nuestros universos como Primor Man, Bebés y Niños, Korea Republic o Natural y Orgánico, donde encontrarás un sinfín de opciones al mejor precio. En Perfumerías Primor nos esforzamos por ofrecer una gran variedad de productos adaptados a todas tus necesidades, incluyendo marcas selectivas, low-cost, ecológicas y de parafarmacia. ¡Una amplia selección para todos los miembros de la familia!


Con nuestra APP tendrás acceso a promociones, ofertas exclusivas y novedades las 24 horas del día. Podrás acceder siempre de forma rápida y segura utilizando tu usuario y contraseña, para gestionar tu perfil, revisar tus pedidos y modificar tus datos personales en cualquier momento. Además, puedes guardar tus productos favoritos en la Wish list para tenerlos siempre listos para tu próxima compra.


Mantente al día con las últimas novedades en cosmética, perfumes, maquillaje low cost y de alta gama, cuidado del cabello, cosmética masculina y mucho más. No te pierdas nuestra sección outlet, donde podrás encontrar tus imprescindibles a precios irresistibles. 


Primor, tu perfumería de confianza desde 1953. Grandes marcas a pequeños precios. Hacemos envíos a toda España y Portugal.
¡Descarga la APP de Perfumerías Primor y disfruta de todas sus ventajas!

New upgrade: Taobao English is now available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Canada, Cambodia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Georgia and Mongolia!For other regions, stay tuned! We're working hard to upgrade for you, in the meantime, you can still shop in our Chinese interface!

Taobao (iPhone version) offers a convenient and engaging shopping experience, specifically designed for iPhone users.

As a leading e-commerce platform in China, Taobao provides an extensive selection of products, catering to the diverse and personalized needs of over 1 billion users. Known as the "Omnipotent Taobao", it stands as a trusted destination for quality and variety for its users. 

Every day, consumers from around the globe visit Taobao, eager to explore more products for their daily needs and keep up with the latest trends!Product Features:

1. Extensive Range of Global Brands
Discover thousands of brands and retailers, offering both Chinese and international products to consumers worldwide.

2. Diverse Offerings from Small and Medium-sized Vendors
Access tens of millions of unique products from small and medium-sized businesses, as well as innovative entrepreneurs, showcasing creative and thoughtfully designed items.

3. Safe and Seamless Shopping Experience
We've integrated local e-wallets and credit card payments in selected regions, along with cross-border direct shipping options. Some products also feature free shipping and/or local return services, ensuring a secure, joyful, and effortless shopping journey.

4. NEW English Interface Now Available!
The English interface is available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, and Cambodia. Simply update your language settings. We're working hard to expand this feature to more regions soon!

5. Year-Round Promotional Activities
Take advantage of our numerous promotional events throughout the year. Enjoy discounted prices and exclusive platform benefits, making it easy to find high-quality products at even better prices.

Shop online with Takealot, South Africa’s #1 shopping app and get your order delivered to your door with safe, contactless delivery, or collect at a Takealot Pickup Point at a time and place that is convenient to you! 

Find amazing savings on everyday essentials, groceries, sports equipment, body and hair care, tech and more! Get everything you need delivered from one shopping app.

Buy great products at great prices through one simple, secure online shopping experience. Find great deals on pet care, toiletries and get your groceries delivered safely and securely.

Browse millions of products across 28 departments from household cleaning, baby care, and coffee essentials to electronics, books, gaming and first aid - plus much, much more. Shop around and save items you want to custom lists for later. Essentials for mom and baby are available at our every day low prices.

Shop for kids toys like Lego, Fisher Price and Barbie. Or, shop for the whole family and buy board games for hours of fun!

Order on your mobile in less than a minute, with easy, safe payment options, including credit, debit and Instant EFT. Takealot lets you shop securely, with biometric face or thumbprint ID.

Unless your password is “password”, you’re going to love this nifty new login method. Simply use fingerprint or facial recognition to quickly and easily start shopping on SA’s #1 online shopping app.

Get your goodies delivered to your door anywhere in South Africa, even on weekends. Deliveries are contact-free, so simply pick up the package when it’s dropped off at your doorstep.

Please note: certain products, such as large appliances, are not eligible for collection. These products must be delivered to a home or business address.

We promise safe, reliable touchless delivery on every order – free when you spend over R650 – and hassle-free returns if something isn’t right. T&Cs apply.

Takealot: Shop Anything You Can Imagine.
Download now to get everything you like to buy, delivered right to your door!

TAKEALOT FEATURES:

SALES & DISCOUNTS

Shop for anything you can imagine and get it from your fingertips to your front door. Download the takealot.com mobile app today and find everything you need in one place!

Want the latest fashion, homeware and sports gear? There’s an app for that!

Download our app now and get everything you love about MRP, including our famous value right at your fingertips. Browse, shop and stay ahead of what’s new directly from our app, anytime, anywhere.

Here are just some of the awesome features you can get your hands on: 
• Easy, safe shopping and checkout. Use Finger ID to login and shop.

Shop App's first ever Free Delivery Festival is here!
Shop from over millions of products at the best prices possible, and get your items delivered for FREE.

Here’s what Shop App Free Delivery Festival has in store for you:[pp[

FREE DELIVERY NATIONWIDE 
Shop over millions of products from the convenience of your home, and get your items delivered for free.

EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNT ON YOUR FIRST ORDER

Get the Woolworths app and enjoy quality and difference whenever, wherever you need it.

It’s everything you’ve come to expect from South Africa’s best-loved retailer, and there’s so much more to come.

Shop on the go
Browse, search and shop fashion, beauty, homeware and food wherever you are, and choose the delivery option that works for you:

Standard delivery: Choose your date and time and we’ll deliver to your door. 

Click and Collect: Shop Woolies food and collect it from a Woolies store when and where it’s convenient for you.

Dash Delivery: Shop Woolies food and get your order delivered fast, fresh and same day!

Stay a step ahead
Turn on push notifications to be the first to know about exclusive offers and promotions, and keep connected with messages and news in your app inbox.

Stay inspired
Get the latest style trends and mouth-watering recipes as soon as you open the app.

Ratings and reviews
Find out what customers are saying about their recent purchases and share your thoughts with our Woolies community.

Virtual try on
Try before you buy and get the latest, and best, look with our virtual try on service.  Available on selected beauty products using your device’s camera and remember to smile for that selfie! 

Scan a product 
Get instant product info when you scan a product in a store or at home.  Add to your basket for quick and easy shopping.

Find in store
Need something special right now?  Our app can tell you what we have in stock at all your nearest stores, so you can plan your shopping journey better than ever and be sure to get what you need.

.Shopping list
Add any products to your in-app shopping list while you’re browsing. It’s easy to use and so convenient when you’re on the go. 


Find your store
Use our store locator to find your nearest store, its contact details and opening hours. iOS users, open directions to your chosen store in Apple Maps.

Check your account
Woolies card holders, check your account balance, available funds, next payment date, and your last 20 transactions on the go! You can also view your full statement and make your payment wherever you are.

Shop with your virtual store card
Whether you’ve left your store card at home or you’re waiting for your new card to be delivered, you can use your Woolies Virtual Store Card in our app.

Be secure
Can’t find your Woolies store card but think you might? Freeze it in our app so no one can use it. Definitely lost your card or it’s been stolen? Block it and arrange a replacement in our app. 

Get funds
You can apply for a store card, credit card, a loan or a credit limit increase straight from the app! Remember, if you have a Woolworths Personal Loan, you can request funds to be transferred into your account at any time.

Get rewarded
Get personalised WRewards virtual card and vouchers in the app. Cashiers will scan the digital WRewards card and vouchers on your phone at checkout. You can also check your tier status, WRewards savings, and your next tier goal.

Easy log in
Use the same sign in details for our website and app. 

Get in touch
You’ll find our contact details, email address and FAQs in the app. You can chat to our Financial Services team direct from the app.

Description. 

Get the latest trends and discover them from any location. If you love wearing fashion and using any occasion to buy clothes via the internet, download our MANGO app. Simple, easy and intuitive! 

Our most digital version features all the garments in the collection: women’s, men’s and children’s clothing. What’s more, through notifications you can discover the latest products, enjoy exclusive offers and stay up to date with the latest trends in online fashion. 

Choose your favourites with the app! Download it free and enjoy a unique experience in mobile format. 

Fashion on your mobile. 

Wherever you are, log on quickly to get your must-haves. Browse through the different collections featured, be inspired by the proposed outfits in each editorial and find what you are looking for by using the size, colour and price filters. Be inspired by all the proposals for the perfect shopping experience.  

Your online shopping bag can be accessed from any device. 

Whenever you log on to our online clothing app with your user ID and password, your items will be saved so that you can access them from any device. So, if you start filling your shopping bag from your Smartphone and later decide to continue shopping via your Tablet, the items will be synchronised, allowing you to finalise your order whenever and however you want. Enjoy your online fashion app whenever you want! 

Barcode scanner. 

You can also use the app when you are shopping in our physical stores. If you see an item you want to buy but there are none left in your size or preferred colour, you can get it via our app. Scan the barcode of the item, or enter it manually, to see where you can find one or to buy it online. Once you have placed the order, you can receive it at home or at your preferred location. 

Exclusive information

You can also use our app to stay up to date with our promotions and exclusive offers in online fashion. Enable the instant notifications feature and you’ll be among the first to discover the new collection garments arriving each week, the lookbooks to inspire your stylings of the season and the discounts and promotions you can enjoy. 

Find your nearest store. 

If you need to have the garment you want right now, use the geolocation feature of our app and find your nearest store and the quickest way to get there. 

Create your Wishlist. 

Now, your Wishlist, in a single click: include all the garments you like most in your Wishlist. Also, if you didn't manage to buy a garment in time, you can enable an availability notification. Simply enter your e-mail and you’ll receive a message as soon as it’s back in stock. 

Manage your account. 

Log on to your profile and edit your personal data whenever you like, for example the delivery address. You can also log on to the My orders section to keep all your till receipts, for both online orders and your purchases in physical stores.  You can also track all your orders and manage any returns. 

The MANGO app is much more than an online store. Shop in a simple and secure way. 

We invite you to send us your comments and suggestions on this update at the following e-mail address: online@mango.com

Makro Online Shopping App
Trusted by thousands of customers, the Makro online shopping app offers great deals on everything you need. Explore a wide range of products across all departments and enjoy a fast, convenient shopping experience.

Shop Smart & Save More
Makro is your one-stop shop for electronics, groceries, liquor, home essentials, and much more. With our easy-to-use design, finding your essentials is a seamless experience, saving you time and effort.

Convenient Shopping Anytime, Anywhere
Use your existing Makro account or easily create a new one to shop your favourites at your convenience. Enjoy free delivery on orders over R500 or choose Next Day Pickup for ultimate flexibility.

Explore Seasonal Promotions & More4Less
Stock up on your everyday essentials without breaking the bank by taking advantage of great seasonal specials and ongoing promotions.

Safe and Secure Payment Options
Shop confidently with a variety of secure payment options, including credit card, debit card, and EFT. The Makro Shopping App ensures a safe and hassle-free online shopping experience.

Avon ON is your always-on-the-go companion, allowing you to manage and promote your Avon business with ease and efficiency. All you need is your phone.  You will have exclusive access to the latest digital brochures & content, revolutionizing the way you serve your customers.​

What’s in it for you?​

- Keep track of your business. It’s now easier for you as a Representative to manage your business​
- Work your way. You can order straight from  our latest digital brochures wherever you are, 24/7​
- Connect with customers. Post our unique, customized content on social media to link up with existing customers and find new ones​
- Become an Influencer. Be the first to know about our latest products and offers. Create personalized posts and videos to promote your business on social media​
- Serve on the go. Accept and process customer orders within the app​
- Manage your business. View your account details and pay your account*​
- Be in the know. Update your contact details* so you’re always able to get the latest news and info​
- Connect & upskill. Connect with other Representatives and learn new skills on our award-winning learning platform, Avon Connect​
- Level up. As a Leader, you can access Avon Office and link to the Avon Grow App*​

The benefits are endless!​

Avon ON is available for registered Representatives and Leaders only.  Visit the Avon Website in your country to sign up.​

*Available in certain markets only.​

developer: Zhejiang Alibaba Xianyu Network Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
闲鱼阿里巴巴集团旗下APP，买卖闲置，就用闲鱼！无须开店却能享受支付宝担保交易，仅需30秒即可发布一款宝贝。
 
没有金刚钻，还真不敢揽这瓷器活儿！
-支付宝担保的个人交易平台：更诚信，更安全！
-淘宝已买到宝贝，随时随地一键转卖，立即变现。
-淘宝上亿买家都可以看到你的宝贝，商品更容易被卖出！（这个比较牛）
-卖家发布更简单，语音描述，扫条码更轻松
 
他们都在，就缺你啦！
许多妈妈在这儿，
转卖孩子们用不着的玩具、物品，
同时也在这里交流着养儿育儿的心得经验，
这些东西她们给自己孩子用过，所以，你放心！
 
许多达人混迹于此，
倒腾古书、镜头、模型、限量版篮球鞋等等，
他们在这儿不仅转卖闲置，还结交到了同好朋友！
在新品市场找不到的，也许你可以在这试试！
 
最爱这儿的还是剁手党's，
那些对他们没新鲜感，或者不再爱的物件儿，
都能在这儿找到新的主人，节省空间的同时还能有笔小收入。
物尽其用，正是这个道理！

The Made-in-China.com App is a world leading wholesale mobile B2B marketplace for global trade. Buy products from quality Chinese suppliers all from your mobile device conveniently. 

3 STEPS to complete your transaction:
Search Products > Place Orders > Trade Safely

Shop What You Need
We provide safe and reliable online trading services. All transaction processes can be completed in our app. You can place an order and track your order anytime, anywhere.

Easy Sourcing
Source millions of new and innovative products from Verified Suppliers. 40,000,000 products from 27 categories are all for your purchase requirements. Now you can easily select and compare products.

Get Multiple Quotations
Post customized sourcing requests, you will receive price quotes in 24 hours. 
6,000,000 suppliers gathered here are trade agents, wholesalers, retailers, manufacturers and SMEs, fulfilling the demands from sellers on Amazon, eBay, wish, etsy, mercari, lazada and so on.

Keep in Touch
Send inquiries to get latest factory discounts or sample requests. Chat directly with suppliers by TradeMessenger system. You can make a voice call or video call to verify the supplier.  

Brand New Smart Expo
Hold various online exhibitions that simultaneous with major trade fairs from all over the world. No matter where you are, you can efficiently browse the virtual booths and start face-to-face online meetings with exhibitors at once.

Member Events
Organize diverse forms of member events on a regular basis. Semi-monthly live video streaming, celebration activities during festivals, events that open to everyone...... All is waiting for you!

Languages & Currencies Supported
The Made-in-China.com supports 16 popular languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Russian, Italian, German, Dutch, Arabic, Korean, Japanese, Hindi, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Indonesian. And 18 local currencies are now available.

Moreover
Get most relevant recommendations based on your sourcing preferences.
Share products and suppliers on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, etc.
“Featured” channel helps you find trustworthy suppliers and high-quality products.

The Made-in-China.com App, a must-have app in global B2B trade!
DOWNLOAD NOW AND GROW YOUR BUSINESS!

Are you always searching for the latest trends? Do you love discovering new outfits? 
Do you always go for looks that are a hit wherever you go? Then this is the place for you! 

Download the Bershka app now and discover a new way of buying clothes and fashion online, view fashion items on a daily basis, see the latest trends for him and for her, manage your account and find the nearest stores.


THE COMPLETE BERSHKA CATALOGUE IS WITHIN REACH 


With the Bershka app, you will get access to the online store and can buy clothes in the most comfortable way, get the latest news, the latest fashion trends and items, women’s clothing (dresses, coats, shirts, skirts, blouses, boots…) men’s clothing (trousers, shirts, jackets, t-shirts, shoes…) and accessories (bags, purses, jewellery, belts…) as well as beauty and make-up. 

CREATE A WISH LIST WITH ALL THE ITEMS YOU LOVE 

You can do more than just buy clothes. You can also look at the complete catalogue, select the items that you like the most, choose complete outfits, and make a list of the latest trends for your next shopping trip - choose what you love best! 

MANAGE YOUR ACCOUNT 

With the app, you can do more than just buy clothes. 
You can also manage your orders, keep track of your online purchases, contact the customer service team if you have any questions and recommend the app to your friends. 

DISCOVER THE STORES CLOSEST TO YOU 

Thanks to geolocation, the app can tell you where the nearest store is and whether the store sells womenswear, menswear or both, and also provides you with a contact number for the store in case you want to order a specific item. You can also save your favourite items to a list and access them immediately if necessary.


EVERYTHING YOU CAN DO WITH THE BERSHKA APP

√ Discover the latest fashion trends
With the app, you can quickly see which clothes will be in fashion each season.
√ Buy all the catalogue items 
Choose the clothes you love and buy them! You only have to choose your payment method, enter the delivery address and wait for your order to arrive as quickly as possible.
√ Create a wish list with the items you love the most 
You can find out which clothes and accessories are on-trend and you can also save the items you like the most to a wish list. You can add items for women and men in the app with a QR code or with a scanner. 
√ Manage your account 
Via your user account, you can review your purchases, track your orders and contact the customer service department with any questions you may have.
√Find new places to shop
The app shows you a list of the nearest stores. You can also see their location on the map and add them to your favourites list or view their details (contact phone number, if they sell womenswear, menswear or both, and the exact address)


Do you like to dress in the latest fashion? Do you like to buy clothes, shoes and accessories for women and men directly from your mobile? Do you want to see all the orders you have placed? Do you want to discover new stores? In that case, the Bershka app is exactly what you have been looking for. 

It’s much more than an online store.

COMPRAR ONLINE

¡Compre todo lo que necesita a través de la app Mercado Libre! Es muy fácil buscar precios y comprar online.

¡Conozca diferentes categorías de productos! Electrodomésticos (cocina, heladera), ropa, y electrónicos (celulares, pc gamer) y accesorio para vehículos para comprar en línea utilizando la aplicación oficial que reúne millones de productos de sus marcas favoritas.

Encuentre la mayor variedad de productos para que usted pueda comparar precios y ver las opiniones de otros compradores.

En la mayor tienda online encontrará varias categorías y podrá comprar todo tipo de productos y regalos en una sola aplicación, como:
- Moda: camisetas, camisas, pantalones, vaqueros, zapatillas, ropa deportiva;
- Electrodomésticos: heladera, cocina, microondas, lavadora, aspiradora;
- Electrónicos: Pc gamer, notebook, celulares.
- Cuidado personal: perfumes, maquillaje, cremas;
- Accesorios para vehículos: neumáticos

Promociones, ofertas y precios bajos para ahorrar en su compra online. Recuerde que en tu primera compra tiene un cupón de descuento. Además de  nuestros envíos gratuitos en 24 horas* recibirá sus compras online súper rápido.

En la tienda online puede encontrar descuentos exclusivos y miles de marcas: electrónicos (celulares, notebook), electrodomésticos (heladeras y microondas), protector solar, perfumes, productos de maquillaje y belleza, moda (zapatillas, vaqueros, pantalones cortos, vestidos) ropa deportiva y neumáticos.

Ventajas de comprar online en la aplicación:

- Marque los productos que más le gusten para comprarlos en promoción. 
- Facilite sus compras en línea utilizando filtros de precio, ubicación y envío gratuito. 
- Disponemos de una variedad de productos por categorías para comparar precios: electrodomésticos, muebles (cama, colchón, sofá), moda (ropa, vaqueros, shorts, vestidos, zapatos), maquillaje, productos de belleza (protector solar, bronceadores) y muebles.
- Ahorre dinero con descuentos y cupones en las tiendas online oficiales. 
- 12 cuotas con tarjeta de débito, tarjeta de crédito, efectivo, sin tarjeta de Mercado Crédito o con el dinero disponible en la cuenta de Mercado Pago 
- Reciba su pedido sin salir de casa con envío gratuito en 24 horas. 
- Gestione sus compras online y comience a vender online.
- Compre online con ofertas exclusivas y envío gratis: electrónicos (celulares, notebook), juegos, electrodomésticos (cocina, heladera), libros, protector solar, productos de belleza, muebles (sofá, colchón), ropa deportiva, vestidos, pantalones, zapatos y sombreros.
- Aproveche los descuentos para comprar sus productos online a bajo precio, con promociones especiales.

PELÍCULAS Y SERIES GRATIS

Disfruta gratis de películas, series y contenido infantil en Mercado Play. Puedes hacerlo desde tu computadora o celular. También puedes transmitir en tu televisor a través de chromecast. Accede desde el ícono en la página principal de Mercado Libre para ver películas y series cuando quieras.

VENDER ONLINE

¡Con Mercado Libre usted puede vender más rápido!

- Haga sus anuncios gratis en 4 sencillos pasos y empiece a vender online.
- Gestione sus compras y ventas online desde su cuenta. 
- Hable con su comprador o vendedor a través de nuestra herramienta de mensajes instantáneos.

Venda electrodomésticos (heladera, microondas, cocina, lavadora), perfumes, productos de belleza, maquillaje, ropa (zapatos, vaqueros, pantalones, vestidos), deportes, electrónicos (celulares, PC gamer, notebook), accesorios para vehículos y neumáticos.

Life’s easier in the eBay app! Buy and sell millions of items on the go. Discover exclusive online deals every single day.

Never miss a deal
With the eBay app, you can stay in the know with real-time alerts about your Daily Deals, order updates and more, all sent to your device with personalised push notifications.

Search, find and save faves
Experience game-changing shopping wherever you are:
● Shop by condition: From brand new to pre-loved fashion and Refurbished tech, find something that’s just right for you.
● Heart your faves: Stay in the loop on the latest drops and deals by adding them to your Watchlist.
● Search with pics: See something you like? Simply upload it with the push of a button and find matches instantly.

Planet-friendly shopping
Save money while discovering something truly unique when you shop for vintage and pre-loved finds. Plus, give great pieces a second life and help the planet while you’re at it. What’s not to love?

eBay Live exclusives
Your real-time shopping experience is here! Join the livestream for exclusive drops, live auctions, case breaks, and beyond. Connect with your community, fave sellers,
and creators for more of the things you love. 

Free selling
Clear out your space the easy way. Sell for free* and list your past loves with our handy AI tools. Plus, enjoy the benefits of Simple Delivery, including prepaid labels, automatic tracking and full protection for items lost or damaged in transit.
*Excludes Vehicles and business sellers.

Quickly list items with AI
Snap or upload a photo in the eBay app, then let AI instantly generate descriptions and key details for your listing, including brand, category and more. You can also add order tracking and chat with your community live.

Authenticity Guarantee
Shop with confidence. The Authenticity Guarantee tick means eligible trading cards, sneakers, watches and handbags will be inspected and verified by expert authenticators.

eBay Money Back Guarantee
Enjoy total peace of mind thanks to eBay Money Back Guarantee. With us, you’re covered. Get the item you ordered or your money back, it’s that simple.*

*For full eligibility criteria and all terms and conditions, visit:
https://pages.ebay.co.uk/ebay-money-back-guarantee/

Explore quick and easy payment options
We make it easy to pay for the things you want. Simply store your preferred payments safely and securely so you can check out in a flash!

Keep in touch
Your feedback is important to us. Contact us with any questions by joining the discussion at www.ebay.com/iOS.

Discover our App for a complete experience: explore new items, add your favorite garments, enjoy the best looks, and shop with just one click.

Stradivarius is the online women's clothing store you've been searching for. A brand that adapts to current fashion trends. All the summer, spring, winter, and autumn trends at your fingertips. Welcome to the Stradivarius App.

With the Stradivarius app, you will receive the most anticipated notifications so you can stay trendy and not miss the garment of the moment. We have different types of sections: New Collection, Clothing, STR Teen, Shoes, Accessories, and much more.

STRADIVARIUS, the online clothing store for women. All the benefits of our app include:

  - STORE LOCATOR: Find all the outfits and best looks at your nearest store by activating geolocation on your device. Are you ready to go shopping at your nearest store? Remember, if you prefer, you can always shop directly in our online stores or from the Stradivarius app.

  - QR CODE AND VOICE SEARCH: Scan the QR code on the tag of the look you are searching for or use voice search to find the perfect outfit.

  - E-TICKET: Use the electronic ticket option to save all your online purchases in your app.

  - TRACKING NOTIFICATIONS: Enable automatic notifications to stay up-to-date on all news, fashion trends, new looks, and when your order will arrive.

  - WISHLIST: Add your favorite outfits and online clothes to your wishlist to create the best looks of the season.

  - ONE-CLICK PURCHASE: Save your credit or debit card to make purchases in the Stradivarius app with a single click.

  - MANAGE YOUR PROFILE: From the app, you can manage your personal data, address, favorite stores, and reservations you have made at Stradivarius physical stores.

The filter in the app is available to easily find the latest trends: clothing, shoes, accessories... save your favorite outfits to your wishlist and shop for all the clothes in our online or physical stores.

Show off the best looks and outfits with Stradivarius discounts at all our stores!

Discover a new way to shop online for women's clothing and also create a wishlist with your favorite looks, outfits, and fashion.

Shop online easily and find the best women's looks in the online store, manage your orders, and complete your favorite fashion outfits. You'll find dresses, t-shirts, shirts, jeans, pants, shoes, and any accessory— the best looks for this season!

Haven't downloaded the Stradivarius app yet?

Choose the best online clothes to combine your outfits, stay fashionable and comfortable every day. You can also create a wishlist with your favorite online clothing and the best looks, pay in stores, and find the best outfits at the nearest stores.

Don't wait any longer and download the Stradivarius app, your favorite online clothing store with the latest trends in fashion.
